• Work Type: Graphic Branding
  • Project scale: Tiny
  • Facebook Page: SHINE Page

Task

Design a logo to use as a brand name and a cover page image for facebook. The logo had to look professional and relate to what the business tailors in. The cover page had to list what they offer.

Process

The client requested that the logo looked professional and essentially use gold colors to make the logo stand out, some brainstorming ideas were thrown about such as the idea that made it into the final version which was the diamond. This logo went through multiple revisions as shown below which also included trying an entirely different design concept. The cover page didn't require as much time or brainstorming because the services offered were predetermined and used the same theme as the logo by using gold and white together on a dark background.

Feedback

The client was delighted with the final design and couldn't wait for the designs to go live on their facebook page along with liking the detail put into the car illustration that felt really sold it.
